= Introduction =

An diary storage service with a front end in OS X and iOS (iPhone and iPad).


= Details =

- http://www.DiaryCloud.com
- Encrypts diary entries and folders and synchronizes them across devices
- Stores a backup copy of the entries and folders on the cloud server
- Free for offline usage, $4.99 a year for cloud services.
- Yet to be finalized and released.
